website_summaries.verdict: A beautifully organized, comprehensive art kit that will get kids into drawing or painting.
pros: Lots of colors and supplies – watercolor paints, oil pastels, crayons, colored pencils and drawing pencils
Carrying case makes it easy to take anywhere
Great for indoor or outdoor use
Comes with pencil sharpener, eraser, and color chart
cons: The quality on the art implement products is not the same as professional products, but it is a good set for beginners

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Hi! I'm 10 years old. I got this for my birthday. It is amazing! You get a TON of crayons, a lot of colored pencils, oil pastels, an eraser, a pencil sharpener and 2 pencils just for $24.79! The colors are really pretty too. Also, the carrying case is SO nice! It is a good quality wood, and it is really big. I CAN'T believe how great it is! :) :) :) :) :) Bye!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda and Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this!
customer_reviews.text: I very rarely write negative reviews, but $27 was too much by about $20 for this product. The art supplies are the cheapest you can imagine, and the box itself literally fell apart the very first time we unlatched the front to open it up. Half the crayons were stuck behind the bottom drawer. The packaging was minimal at best. My artistic daughter was very disappointed, and so was I. Do not waste your money on this product and get sucked in by the numbers; the Frozen art set from Crayola that I got for my other daughter was well worth the money if you are looking for an awesome art set.
customer_reviews.author: Kitten Clawz

customer_reviews.title: Great Starter Kit!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great kit! I got this as an anniversary gift for my girlfriend, and she loved it! It has almost everything that an artist needs, which is very cool. However, just know that it may not be 100% exactly like the product in the picture. The colored pencils I received were entirely different from the original, and it seems the colors in the palette vary a bit too! That wasn't much of an issue for me though, I still think its a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but some of the crayon tips were broken and my grandson wasn't happy because he wanted it to be perfect. Probably happened during packaging or shipping. Nice set thou.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price, for kids, and just doodling
customer_reviews.text: I was lucky that unlike others the box was not broken and did not feel like it would fall apart immediately. Although I would not test it very strenuoisly. My biggest cokplaint is that the box and its ingredients have a pretty strong chemical odor. It will sit outside for at least a night or two. As far as the quality of the contents I think it is fine for the price. I think this is really a kids set. If I went to a local craft shop I think the contents would cost the same or a little more without the box. If you want better quality I would suggest you spend a liile more.
customer_reviews.author: ABThomasTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Jammed bottom drawer
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the the box and tried to open the bottom drawer which contained the crayons it was jammed. I assume this was caused by the transfer during shipping. Now the crayons have become lodged in the drawer, damaging some of them. Forcing me to apply pressure to force open the drawer. When the drawer finally released the crayons went everywhere. I took photos of the incident and would like to send them but don't see a place to do so. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Timbers

customer_reviews.title: Four stars in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Was a birthday gift for my Grandson. Very elaborate, nicely done art case. My Grandson says the oil pastels are his favorite in this case. And he says the crayons are too waxy but ok. The only reason I rate this a 4-star instead of 5, is that one of the wooden drawer knobs came right off the case just as my Grandson unwrapped his gift. And the knob would not go back on. Maybe we can fix it with some glue?? Too late to return or exchange item, by the time Grandson 's birthday rolled around. What a shame, brand-new too. The case looked nice enough until this happened. Should have gone with a Made in America product perhaps.
customer_reviews.author: GamieTiaBettita

customer_reviews.title: Art Set
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it ~ he couldn’t wait to get started and drew 2 pictures while we were on camera chatting He said It’s so big and I like the wood :) It’ll make someone happy
customer_reviews.author: Carol Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this from my granddaughter for Christmas. My daughter told me it was absolutely spectacular. The box very well put together the items, inside were exactly as pictured and the drawer definitely comes in handy. I was very happy since her UPS guy left it in a pile of snow by her mailbox and didn't bother to come and knock on the door. Whoever packaged this item did an awesome job because the snow didn't damage the item.
customer_reviews.author: GracieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly afraid to order this. So many reviews on products like this melted crayons and hardened pastels. It was a gift to my niece but I decided to chance it. Better reviews. Got it and it was together and nice! Nothing falling out or melted. I will say they need to put something in there to prevent the pencils and things from coming out. The grooves dont make it tight enough. Otherwise its a very nice set and she loved it!
customer_reviews.author: MonicaMartin41Top Contributor: Fantasy Books

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD. I gave it to my granddaughter as a ...
customer_reviews.text: There is no handle to carry this set... NOT GOOD. I gave it to my granddaughter as a gift and she picked it up to carry it and everything fell out and when she dropped it the case broke. To say the least, it was not good. If there was a lock and handle this would be an awesome set.
customer_reviews.author: Huckleberry Cher

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this kit!
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased this set as a Christmas (2013) gift for my daughter. This purchase I am reviewing was for a gift. Most art supplies I purchase my daughter (9yo) get lost or relegated to the bottom of drawers etc. This set she has kept meticulously organized and uses it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: beautiful box!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift. There is a decent variaty and good quality of art supplies but to be honest, I would pay for just the box itself! It's an excellent wooden box, very beautiful. It makes the supplies feel professional. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Clingenpeel

customer_reviews.title: Torn between 3-4 stars.....
customer_reviews.text: I'm somewhat torn between 3-4 stars. The case itself is nice and it is truly a nice set for the price. However, like many reviews stated, the crayons were ruined. They were stuck under the box and many were broken. Maybe a thin piece of tape would prevent the crayons from getting ruined during shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: With that said my kid loves these and we are very happy with the quality of the actual art supplies and ...
customer_reviews.text: The lower drawer came with the crayons all mixed up from shipping. It had taken me over an hour to gently remove them before I could get the drawer out and fix them. With that said my kid loves these and we are very happy with the quality of the actual art supplies and box. I marked this down because they should be putting something in that lower drawer to keep things from floating around when the UPS guy kicks it.
customer_reviews.author: Mountain Man Jack

customer_reviews.title: Decent set. NO markers! Yay! Check your crayons though.
customer_reviews.text: If you get this as a gift for someone, do yourself a favor and open it when you receive it. Half of the crayons in the bottom had come loose and were stuck resulting in a few broken ones before I even gave it away. Also, the crayon colors in the bottom are duplicates. 2-3 of the exact same color. I’m buying a 64pack of [higher quality crayon company] and replacing the ones sent with it for the [higher quality crayon company] ones. The best part? NO MARKERS. Most of the time in these kits you get a bunch of single use markers and there are NONE in this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! Not only is this a cheap product but it was missing pieces. I would LOVE to send it back and get my money returned, but this was given to my daughter as her Santa gift. Returning it would destroy the magic.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth'Mae Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice art set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a Christmas gift for my 10 year old who loves to draw and color. After reading the reviews I was not really sure what to expect however after receiving it I can see that money was well spent. It is a really nice art set and the case is not as cheap or flimsy as some of the other reviews lead my to believe. I am very pleased with my purchase as well as my 10 year old. Very great quality....
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Go to Hobby Lobby!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money by a long shot! Cheap wood, cheap supplies, ugh! What a waste...
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R

customer_reviews.title: All in one box
customer_reviews.text: 1st off I didn't think the box would hold up as I was ordering it online. To my surprise it hasn't broken yet after a few weeks of use. There is a large selection supplies in the box & all nicely layed out. This was a good purchase. She's happy, I'm happy, everyone's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba40

customer_reviews.title: Great for a young artist! Wish it had a handle. :(
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find something creative for a 7-year old's birthday. Ended up finding this on Amazon. It arrived this week and while I can't unwrap it an open it, it appears great! The box is super sturdy and looks high end. My only wish is that it had a handle to make it portable. It's honestly a bit large and heavy for my little one to lug around. Regardless, as soon as it arrived and met expectations, I ordered one for another birthday party we have coming up.
customer_reviews.author: Queen City Mama

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter's ninth birthday. She loves to draw and this set has everything she needs. As a beginner, she liked the insert that shows how to do some basic techniques as well. It's an impressive collection for the money. Best of all there is a place for everything, so supplies are not being left everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Mamma Tried

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for beginners and experts
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I got $50 for Christmas and planned to spend it on Th is, and a few sketch books. Totally worth it. Everything cane in a nice wood box, with everything in its place! It comes with colored pencils, oil pastels, paint, two brushes, two pencils, a ton of crayons, one eraser, and a sharpener. It’s also great for beginners, as it has a little tutorial for drawing. Overall, I’d say ty is is wonderful. The only thing I would change, is the outer design. It would be great to have a Handle for easy transportation!
customer_reviews.author: pragya

customer_reviews.title: İt is disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Most of them is broken and i cant give it to my daughter as a gift.Please resending me the usable one.and i would like to add another pictures but system doesn't allow to do it.
customer_reviews.author: özgür

customer_reviews.title: Broken/missing contents Upon Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I think this could have been a nice set. Several crayons were broken and missing when we opened the box. Some had fallen out of their spot and were in the back of the drawer, in pieces. Overall items were OK, but not the best quality. My daughter likes the set, wish it was packaged better so that it would have been a nicer gift upon opening.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My daughter is very happy with this set.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is very happy with this set. She loves to draw and paint and color and this was a nice set for her. No problems with the case or the drawer at all so far. Good started set for those who love to draw.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING buy well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi I am 10, if you like to drawing this is a very good product. The pencils ( including the colored pencils) are really good quality and last a long time, you get a LOT of crayons but they are really good and sturdy. The pencil sharpener works really well, and the oil pastels (big thick crayons not in the drawer) work great. The water paints are really nice so are the paintbrushs.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great except that the drawer took over 30 minutes to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great except that the drawer took over 30 minutes to open as the crayons in the drawer are not taped down and shifted in shipping, the crayons were jammed horribly and a number were broken. We finally managed to get the drawer open but only after breaking a few more crayons. Overall a wonderful set and granddaughter loved it except for the disappointment of broken crayons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Art set.
customer_reviews.text: I love the wooden case, and you get three of each color, instead of just one. Plenty of back up colors. I was very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Karibia

customer_reviews.title: Just what she wanted....
customer_reviews.text: I've recently reviewed some other gifts for out-of-town grand kids. I hesitated ordering this set because some reviewers were very negative regarding the quality of the contents & also the condition & quality of the box when it arrived. However, she loved it....our son told me she said 'it was her very favorite gift'. And, apparently it arrived in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: 67Cat

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as it looks.
customer_reviews.text: My great-niece is very interested in drawing and wanted some supplies that are not for "little kids." This looked like the perfect set for her. It comes well packed...so well packed I almost didn't open it before I wrapped it. I'm so glad I did! The box is nice but not nearly as nice as it looks in the pictures and when I tried to open the crayon drawer, it wouldn't budge. I probably spent a good 15 minutes trying to get it open. I was afraid of breaking the drawer face off so I gave up. I ended up returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: M. Holodick

customer_reviews.title: Too much for some beginners
customer_reviews.text: You have to decide if your child is ready for all this. It is a great package for someone in middle school or just before. It is also great for an older beginner. I put a handle on it between the drawer and lid so it could be easily carried.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Adults or Teens
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and both grandsons are "doodlers" but I like to think of them more as artists. This was a great christmas gift as all three of them use it. You cannot beat the amount of materials you get for the price! The wooden case is gorgeous. I sent this to CO from NC an not one thing was disturbed!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle E. White

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money. Giftable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend’s daughter as a Christmas gift since she likes art. It was reasonably priced and it included so much art supplies. I never got to see the inside but I the wooden box it came in was really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value and quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter now stays in her room for hours instead of glued to the TV! These were great quality and value for the money
customer_reviews.author: vin

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: I have reviewed a lot before buying. I made a very good decision, thank you. M. Behcet YUCELEN
customer_reviews.author: M. Behcet Yucelen

customer_reviews.title: My Son is on love with this set... I was very impressed with packaging and quality of wooden box
customer_reviews.text: My Son had started to really get into Art and displays a talent for it. He asked for some art supplies to get him started for Christmas and he loves this set. I was very impressed with the packaging and nice, sturdy wooden box that holds all the contents. I had no problem with any pieces being broken or jumbled in the drawer. He uses it constantly and couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Malinda SynnamonTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The 8 year old birthday girl gives this art set 10 stars! (me too)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an 8 year old's birthday. She said she wanted an 'art kit' so I ordered this and hoped for the best. PERFECTION. She was beyond delighted as it has all the drawing/painting tools she wanted and is enclosed in a lovely wood case. One caveat: I had it sent to my house for pre-party inspection and am glad I did. The crayons in the drawer were out of their slots, in a jumble, making the drawer difficult to open. So I carefully opened the drawer, removed the crayons one by one, and put them back. Then wrapped the case and everything stayed intact until opened at the party. She would give it 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Moretti

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Set
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these for grandchildren and then ordered three more. One for an adult coloring/card enthusiast; one for an almost teen granddaughter and one to have at my home for use by anyone that needs it. They are beautiful and have a nice variety of coloring items.
customer_reviews.author: Planning DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set. The wood case is very sturdy. I bought this for my almost 9 year old, and upgrated from a crayola set, that had a hevy duty cardboard case. So far, this is a great upgrade. He's very happy with the case and quality of the products inside. No complaints from us!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Stanley

customer_reviews.title: She Loved It!!!
customer_reviews.text: The art kit came in great shape no knicks or scratches etc. The bottom tray did have crayons hung up in the back of it but all you have to do is pull the drawer out and then they fall out so no big deal at all. My 10yr old niece LOVED it. She loves to draw and do art projects so this was perfect for her. I WOULD recommend buying this set.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarbear

customer_reviews.title: so many different medias to pick from
customer_reviews.text: its a beautiful box with lovely art supplies for a beginner. so perfect for my granddaughter who is 7. she will love it I am sure because i sure do! Be gentle with it when you open and close it. it is not a super sturdy box but it is pretty and good for the price, $22!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Granger

customer_reviews.title: Younger kids
customer_reviews.text: It’s an okay product not great but okay. You do get a lot for the price. However the material isn’t the greatest not that I expected it to be for the price. It’s good for beginners and younger kids if you’re afraid of them braking things.
customer_reviews.author: kendy

customer_reviews.title: Niece loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice art set for a young person (or probably anyone who loves to draw). Give this to my niece along with some paper and she is a happy camper. I don't know from art supplies, but it seems like a good value to me. It was packaged very securely and arrived in new condition. Nice looking box just like the picture. +If this is a gift for a young person, make sure you show them the drawers before they try to pry the top layer off. =)
customer_reviews.author: Snowdragon

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grand daughter who likes to drawer, it has all she needs at this stage. The only drawback (pardon the pun) is the drawer on the bottom which could easily slide out; spilling crayons on the floor. This was remedied with a trip to the local home center for a hook and eye set. I managed to find a matching metal. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Contents rolling around loose in box
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with the wooden box wrapped neatly in cellophane and appears nice on the outside. However, the contents could be heard rolling around the inside - it sounded as if the entire contents were loose in the box. This is very disheartening as this was intended to be a gift for a child in our community.
customer_reviews.author: Lakelubber

customer_reviews.title: trays heavily glued to case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for the case. I've used the colored pencils and they aren't the best or worst I"ve ever used. If your kid needs them for school, they'll definitely work. What was disappointing to me is that the plastic inserts are heavily glued to the case. This is great if you never want to remove them, but very frustrating if you do.
customer_reviews.author: LAH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome box of art supplies
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my kids at Christmas and it’s one of the items they continue to use almost daily. From drawings, to making their own birthday cards for friends, etc, it’s the go to box. Perfect gift for your own kid’s or for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, beautiful art set
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful set for the budding artist 🎨 My son received this for his 12th birthday. The variety of mediums is fantastic and everything is neatly organized in the beautiful carrying case. 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty nice. Especially for the money. My 6 year old daughter goes through art supplies like water and she can be a little disorganized. This helped a lot. It also gave her the opportunity to try many different things. The watercolors disappeared first so then I knew to buy more watercolors
customer_reviews.author: Milad Bakhtiari

customer_reviews.title: Budding artist.
customer_reviews.text: Sent this as a gift to a fifteen year old budding artist in Mexico as a Christmas gift. She was thrilled. She enjoys expressing herself in the various mediums all contained in one box. This enables her to find the medium she enjoys the most. It is an excellent set to begin an artistic career or for the casual doodle.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Defrese

customer_reviews.title: Great little art kit!
customer_reviews.text: Kids got one from the in-laws for Easter which ‘had to be kept at their house’ so we got our own! It’s in a beautiful little case. This and an adult coloring book has promoted family art night!
customer_reviews.author: KML

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This set is really nice and so is the box it comes in. I’ve read some of the past reviews and I believe they have fixed the problem with loose crayons. I moved the box several times before wrapping it and when my daughter opened it, everything was intact. Very satisfied with this purchase and my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful💖
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect! The box is exactly as shown but even prettier so organized. I bought it for my 10yr old who loves art and this set was perfect...i bought a couple other things in addition to this all worked perfectly for beginner artistic hand ..thank you amazon and the seller within 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Torres

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Turned out to be a great gift for my fiancé’s godson whose now into drawing. The wooden box looked great.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetivr

customer_reviews.title: Nice variety
customer_reviews.text: I wish the case was more durable considering that is why I bought a set that came with a carrying case. It just hasn’t held up even with minimal use. The variety of the media included was a nice plus, and the quality on par with the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Cute box cheap art supplies
customer_reviews.text: The materials inside are so cheap they barely work. The oil pastels could be areas if you tried let alone blended and the crayons are those cheap colorless wax ones. Watercolor worked ok and colored pencils we're ok but definitely not great.
customer_reviews.author: Heath van why

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: This was the best gift. My granddaughter loves art and I purchased this for her. She carried it around and admired it for days, not wanting to use it because she thought it was so beautiful. Finally she broke down and has been creating all kinds of art work because I told her I could always order another. She said it was the best gift she ever received.
customer_reviews.author: Brita Allen

customer_reviews.title: Daugter loves it, very high quality kit.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old girl can't stop playing with it even after two weeks. She loves all the colors and the variety. The box it comes in is very well made makes it feel very premium. This is not some cheap garbage like many others, this is the real deal. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: TCGF F.

customer_reviews.title: Had bigger hopes for this one!
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's my fault for not reading through what it comes with but I was disappointed that it came with some many crayons. I gave this to my sister in law and felt stupid after we opened it. We did have a major problem opening the drawer that has the crayons in it. The concept of the drawer was really cool and I guess that's why I thought it was geared more towards an adult, but the execution of actually using the drawer was a fail. It went through 4 different peoples hands before someone finally got it open. Too bad. I really thought this was a nice gift when I bought it. Overall, I give it a "ok".
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Kline

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend it to a friend.
customer_reviews.text: I like the wooden box. I will probably use it for something else in the future. Because the crayons were not secured in place the drawer could not be opened. I had to shake it several times to loosen the jam. I was able to free the drawer after removing 9 pieces one by one until the jam cleared. The water colors seemed too dry, the water just sat on top of the cake. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for a little kid
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a 4 year old , my colleagues kid. She showed a video of her kid opening the present and my heart filled with how her face lit up. I didn’t open the box from wrap myself but looked like solid construction and a good build.
customer_reviews.author: rockymeister

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift For Our Daughter !
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter Had Her Eye On This Set And My Wife And I Thought We Would Surprise Her With It. She Has Been Wanting To Sketch And Draw, Paint With Water Colours, And Improve Her Skills In Colouring. This Was Perfect For Her ! When The Package Arrived She Immediately Began Using It. The Drawer Was A Bit Stuck, So I Helped Her To Open It Without Breaking A Single Crayon With A Bit Of Patience. Since She Is Not A Professional But Is Still Learning, This Is Perfect For Her Needs ! Later On, We May Upgrade As She Improves. This Suits Her Perfectly !
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Art 101 142- piece wood art set
customer_reviews.text: Product came as described and in a beautiful wooden box my daughter was totally in love with it. There are alot of different things she can do now and crafts. I would recommend this if you have a teen or pre-teen into arts and crafts and loves drawing.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Outten

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids who love art!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 7 year old niece for Christmas. She absolutely loved it. It looks high quality and offers a lot of art options. She has been using it to draw and do art since she got it!
customer_reviews.author: KarinMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend who is recovering from a serious illness. She absolutely loves it and she is passing a lot of her time making art. I read the negative reviews of the case, but the case I got was of excellent quality, especially for the price. All in all it made a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: You get a lot for the price. The pencils broke very easily and needed to be sharpened a lot. Also, our set was missing to crayons! My niece loved it, so I’m thankful, I just had higher expectations for this.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson requested this for Christmas. It was a great price and included a beautiful wood case and lots of options. A beginner wouldn’t necessarily know what to do with all the items. A great gift!
customer_reviews.author: mamak

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for begginer artist's! Any begginer Artist would love this wood box art set.
customer_reviews.text: Great value gift for begginer artist's. Bought for my niece and she loved it! The box is well made and the hidden drawer for the pastels is a pleasant surprise for begginer artist's. Deffinently give This as a gift too a young Artist and you will see Great joy and in happy use.
customer_reviews.author: the enigma

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great gift for all ages. Sometimes you search gifts for certain ages this set is great for all ages in Children and even In adults. There’s a lot of pieces making it your moneys worth.
customer_reviews.author: Sukhpreet

customer_reviews.title: Attractive case. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: The first one arrived and we were not very happy. The bottom drawer was wedged closed and we couldn't open it. The replacement came quickly and my son LOVES it! He hasn't used it as much as I thought he would, but it is great to have on hand for school projects. We love the case. Seems to be filled with decent quality items. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Lover Of Books

customer_reviews.title: Not real wood.
customer_reviews.text: Great first impression, lovely color and grain, but pressed wood product with laminate-looking finish. Bottom lightly glued on and partially coming off, jamming the drawer. No handle, cannot just pick up and carry. Huge variety of pencils, crayons, etc. but mediocre quality. Cannot blend pastel markers. Wouldn't recommend except for very young kids impressed with the array, but not looking to learn art.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Art 101 piece wood art set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit for my great great niece who has wanted this sort of set for months (she's 5, exactly 65 years younger than I am) and she wants to be an artist. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle DiWilesCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift: Third One Purchased
customer_reviews.text: We have bought three of these. Two for our boys and one as a gift. The case is nice and includes a ton of stuff. It looks like it should cost more than it actually does. Makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Price and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets for my granddaughter. They love to draw and color. They have had ten for a month and on weekends and after homework they live to use them. I will buy them another set when the colors runs out
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth money
customer_reviews.text: The wooden box within a few hours after giving it as a gift. Poorly made.
customer_reviews.author: holly s

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gorgeous set and my 10 year old was so pleased when he opened it as a Christmas present. So much comes in it, so you get a lot for your money! Plus, it’s in a beautiful wood case. Don’t hesitate buying this one 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Enright

customer_reviews.title: variety and case were exceptional
customer_reviews.text: My niece ran to me and thanked me after opening the gift. She loves to draw and now has a nicer way to keep her colors. She now can learn to use other types of tools for her art.
customer_reviews.author: Tifani McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old is a great little artist. This had everything he needs with a great carrying case to keep everything organized and not thrown all over my house! Case is sturdy and latches shut for carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves his paint set but I'm disappointed at how many crayons are in it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his paint set but I'm disappointed at how many crayons are in it. We wanted an easy storage place for his water color paints and pencils. The crayons just set there taking up space. I might put them out for younger grat grandchildren and replace it other water color paint tubs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Huff

customer_reviews.title: All Broken, Bad Shipping, Low Quality
customer_reviews.text: So dissapointed with this kit. It came all scratched up. The drawer was completely stuck closed because all of the crayons had fallen out of their slots. That also caused them to break in half and ruin the label. Really low quality materials and holder. Worth it to get a slightly more expensive product for something that will make it through the shipping and offer a higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: George R.

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6 year old and she loved it .she liked that everything was in a case to keep it all together and she could put her paper in there to .
customer_reviews.author: trisha.hargis

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. If the box is carried in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. If the box is carried in the upright (natural) position many crayons will come out of their slots and jam in the drawer compartment. Since the crayons are more brittle than other brands, they tend to break at the tip, and sometimes in the middle. Since two of these will be Christmas presents there is no time to return, refund and select new. Ergo, I am stuck with these. I am hoping the other parts in the kit present less problems.
customer_reviews.author: Dave L

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Looking Kit That contains a lot
customer_reviews.text: This Kit was bought as a gift and the recipient really appreciated the completeness of the contents together with the packaging to ensure that everything was kept together.
customer_reviews.author: RVer Surface user

customer_reviews.title: Nice for kid or beginner
customer_reviews.text: This was for a kids birthday who is really into art. Its really presentable and its a nice cheapy set thats not too cheap if that makes sense
customer_reviews.author: yep

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect set for my 7 year old. The quality was outstanding, and she has lots of options to make her art work all colorful. The pastels are her favorite.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: When this item arrived I was so happy to see it is what I wanted and not ...
customer_reviews.text: When this item arrived I was so happy to see it is what I wanted and not cheap looking! I do wish there would have been paints in there but I should have read that closer. Its ok though because I know she will love it! The carrying case for this item is also very well built!!!! Thank You
customer_reviews.author: yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful art set. Bought as a gift for my daughter and she absolutely loves it. This set has just about everything you need for beginning drawing. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case, materials, quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 6-yr-old grandson. He is THRILLED and so are we! The case is beautiful, and offers a drawer of crayons as a "bonus" to the set. Excellent gift, received well and will be used for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son who loves to draw. When opened at Christmas he was very impressed, as was I, in the quality of the product and the look and weight of the wood case. I would recommend this to anyone that is starting out in their drawing abilities.
customer_reviews.author: melissa mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice set.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old daughter got this as a Christmas gift and she loves it. The case is nice and the art supplies are good quality. I would recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: annadawn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome art set!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11yr old nephew for Christmas and you would have thought I got him a million bucks! He was over the moon excited and couldn’t wait to use it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Marlar

customer_reviews.title: It is just as promised
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. Her little brothers loved it as well. The art kit came as promised, it contained everything mentioned. It is well made. My daughter brings it outside to draw and in her room. It seems to be holding up well. She was super excited.
customer_reviews.author: H. F.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic and very complete art set for any young artist. My daughter has gotten so many hours of joy from creating art work with this set. The case is very sturdy and the art supplies are top notch. This was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Great gift product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my god daughter and she loved it a lot. She loves to paint or draw and I think she has the gift for it. My friends even bought her an easel to go with it. Caution! This are not for kids that will just play with it. This is the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: G. Cachero

customer_reviews.title: Even has a drawer, beautiful art box!
customer_reviews.text: This is so complete and well made looks like it could've cost much more. Can't wait to get started!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer McAlpin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for your budding artist
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yr old loves to draw hes awesome with chalks. I bought this so he'd have more tools to use for his drawings. I love the little wooden box it comes in. Its very sturdy and the variety of colors and tools are decent. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Daniesha Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Approved
customer_reviews.text: All crayons, paints, and pencils were unharmed. Case seals properly! Plenty of color shading for each color. The only negetive I seen was the two day shipping. My daughter would have loved to receive this the day I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great selection & good looking box
customer_reviews.text: Pretty colors, quality looking box & great selection. I took a star off because the hinge broke immediately....as seen in picture. Otherwise awesome for a gift :)
customer_reviews.author: B.W & C.W.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!  What a Deal...
customer_reviews.text: My Set arrived in pristine condition. Packed and wrapped well and everything is perfect. Nice crayons, water color cakes are nicely pigmented and all other items accounted for and in perfect order. Some negative reviews had mentioned other results with their kits. I can say my results could not be better. Really a great all around artist set. I think well done for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Art 101 142-Piece Wood Art Set Amazon Exclusive
product_meta.description:
Art 101's Doodle and Color 142 Piece Art Set includes all the tools needed to expand your creativity and design your next colorful masterpiece! Includes 24 of our colorful Premium Core Colored Pencils, which are perfect for the beginner and advanced artist alike! Our Premium Core Colored Pencils lay down smooth and pigmented on your paper. Build up the color and opacity by varying the pressure on your pencil, and blend different colors together to create different shading effects! There's something for everyone in this set, which also comes with 24 oil pastels and 60 colorful crayons! Our oil pastels are creamy and pigmented, and blend together easily on your paper. Try using the included sketch pencils to sketch out your next drawing, then color it in with your medium of choice! Want to try your hand at painting? Use the 24 watercolor cakes and included paint brushes to add a little color. All your supplies come in a high-quality convenient wood carrying case, which makes keeping your artistic tools organized and easy to use whenever inspiration strikes! Choose from two color choices for your case: a trendy grey wash wood or a rich cherry wood. What's included: • 60 crayons
• 24 oil pastels
• 24 premium core colored pencils
• 24 watercolor cakes
• 3 mixing palettes
• 1 eraser
• 1 sharpener
• 2 sketch pencils
• 2 paint brushes 
• 1 sharpener
• 1 color chart
• 1 wooden case with drawer

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
142 Piece Wood Art Set. Deluxe wood case with Convenient removal drawer. 3 types of drawing and Painting mediums including pencils, crayons pastels and watercolor painting. Complete art set for hours of satisfying and creative fun.
feature_bullets: Includes 24 Premium Core Colored Pencils which color, shade, and blend beautifully
Includes a variety of coloring and painting mediums, including crayons, oil pastels, and watercolors
Comes in a deluxe wooden carrying case with a drawer to easily organize your supplies
Choose between a trendy grey wash wood or cherry wood color for your case
Take your art set with you anywhere to color, draw, and create your next masterpiece

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
